QuestData.Title: A Fitting Guise
QuestData.Description:
The ritual to complete your disguise should be quite simple with the assistance of my oculus. Even a $c like you should be able to manage it.
When you are ready, simply hold the empowered crystal above Nelesis's corpse. My oculus will do the rest.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet Balmedar in the Hall of Blades at the House of Rituals.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Balmedar in the House of Rituals.
QuestData.RewardText:
An impressive resemblance. You may just be able to pull this off.
Well, what are you waiting for?
